botlogs.uponline: {{user}} the your bot instance ** `${botTag}`** is online!
botlogs.commitrestart: {{user}} the your bot instance **`{{botTag}}`** has been updated and restarted successfully!
botlogs.enduser: <@{{obj}}> `({{obj}})` left the server and its Bots and Sites have been removed!
botlogs.ramkilled: <@{{userID}}> the your bot instance **`{{botTag}} ({{botID}})`** was turned off due to lack of RAM!
botlogs.bottimeout: <@{{userID}}> the your bot instance **`{{botTag}} ({{botID}})`** in the free plan it was turned off due to inactivity!

sitelogs.uponline: {{user}} the your website instance **`{{site}}`** is online!
sitelogs.commitrestart: {{user}} the your website instance **`{{site}}`** has been updated and restarted successfully!
sitelogs.ramkilled: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}`** was turned off due to lack of RAM!
sitelogs.upsite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}`** is online!
sitelogs.commitsite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}`** has undergone changes and is now online!
sitelogs.removesite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}`** has been successfully removed!
sitelogs.startsite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}`** is online!
sitelogs.stopsite: <@{{userID}}> the your website instance **`{{site}}`** is offline!
